Game1.title: (1) Gravity Flip Platformer Prototype
Game1.description: Game Design prototype 1 gravity mechanic where the player is required to travel around the environmentwhile avoid colliding with spikes. There are a few coloured items that the player can walk into to change the colour of the character.

Game2.title: (2) Camera Prototype
Game2.description: Game Design prototype 2 camera mechanic where the player is required to move around the environment using the mouse to change the camera view.
